testimonials.headline: DO NOT WAIT ON THIS CLASS!
testimonials.quote: My advice is to NOT wait to make the tradeoff for the training time. It has really paid off quickly. At first, I thought we didn't have the time because of the production demand. I quickly realized that I was mistaken. We have completed the training and are dedicating time for changes while still meeting the demands.
testimonials.name: Jeff Cross
testimonials.title: Plant Manager

testimonials.headline: SMALL CHANGES MAKE A BIG DIFFERENCE.

testimonials.name: Aaron Heller

testimonials.headline: THIS CLASS IS A GREAT REFRESHER!
